attributes.action: make all MP's payback any profit on the sale of their second homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's  second homes are there for them to live and work from during the week and should not be treated as an investment portfolio.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
